sentences.en: Easter Monday is generally regarded as an unofficial consecration of Spring.
sentences.cn: 星期一通常是民间祭春的日子.

sentences.en: He's a kind of unofficial adviser, but I'm not sure exactly what he does.
sentences.cn: 他 像 是个非官方顾问, 但说不好他究竟是干什么的.

sentences.en: Hodges wrote an unofficial biography of the artist.
sentences.cn: 霍奇斯写了一部这位艺术家的非正式传记。
收到非正式的录取通知.

sentences.en: I've personally announced it in an unofficial way to Ariedo Braida.
sentences.cn: 我用个人名义以非官方途径通知了布拉伊达.

sentences.en: In July he issued a decree ordering all unofficial armed groups in the country to disband.
sentences.cn: 他于7月份下令解散国内所有的非正式武装组织。

sentences.en: Indignity or not, he would change his unofficial shirt for a regulation one.
sentences.cn: 不管丢脸不丢脸, 他一定要把普通衬衫换成规定的衬衫.

sentences.en: Many peopele said that my message were very unofficial.
sentences.cn: 让我们预定(姿的)专辑吧.每个人都应该很兴奋,包括燕姿和我.许多人说我的留言很不官方.

sentences.en: Medals won are considered unofficial by the IOC.
sentences.cn: 所颁发的奖牌也被国际奥委会视为非正式的.

sentences.en: My life is divided into two watertight compartments: unofficial and official.
sentences.cn: 我的生活分为互不影响的两部分: 私生活的一面和做官生涯一面.

sentences.en: Salesmen of unofficial souvenirs have also been doing a roaring trade.
sentences.cn: 出售非官方纪念品的推销员的生意也很红火。

sentences.en: The early election returns are unofficial.
sentences.cn: 原来的选举结果是非正式的.

sentences.en: Under Texas law , however, unofficial NEP syringes are drug paraphernalia.
sentences.cn: 但按德州的法律, 非官方的NEP注射器是随身的毒品工具.

sentences.en: Unofficial estimates put the figure at over two million.
sentences.cn: 非官方的估计数字为200万以上。

sentences.en: Unofficial roadblocks along the roads and highways must be disbanded.
sentences.cn: 道路和公路两旁的非正式路障必须拆除.

sentences.en: Vacant days are not included on some unofficial calendars.
sentences.cn: 某些民间历法的空日是不计在365天之内的!

trans.tran_cn: 非官方的，非正式的，不作为官方活动的
trans.tran_en: done or produced without formal approval or permission
